originalText.text: I hired Sheila for face painting and glitter tattoos for my daughter's 7th Birthday, and I'm so glad I did!  Sheila brought magic to the party!  Kids loved her!  She was very kind and professional.   And her art was truly impressive!  We highly recommend her!

text.text: I hired Sheila for face painting and glitter tattoos for my daughter's 7th Birthday, and I'm so glad I did!  Sheila brought magic to the party!  Kids loved her!  She was very kind and professional.   And her art was truly impressive!  We highly recommend her!

originalText.text: Hired Sheila for my daughter's first birthday and it was SO worth it! The kids loved having their face painted and all the balloons. I would 100% recommend having Sheila's team at your next event - you won't regret it!

text.text: Hired Sheila for my daughter's first birthday and it was SO worth it! The kids loved having their face painted and all the balloons. I would 100% recommend having Sheila's team at your next event - you won't regret it!

originalText.text: We worked with Cathy who turned out to be an absolute gem for our daughter’s 4yo birthday party! If you're looking for a face painting service for your kids, look no further. Cathy was not only punctual but also incredibly friendly and patient with the kids. Her artistic skills are unmatched—she's truly a master of her craft! The kids had the most amazing experience, and their faces lit up with joy when they saw their face paint designs. Don't hesitate to book Cathy for your next event; she's a must-have for any children's party!

originalText.text: Sheila joined us for my son’s 5th birthday, which was over 30 kids, and a little chaotic. She was incredibly calm and loving towards the kids and they all got amazing face paint. All the parents were raving about it, and we will definitely use Sheila again.

text.text: Sheila joined us for my son’s 5th birthday, which was over 30 kids, and a little chaotic. She was incredibly calm and loving towards the kids and they all got amazing face paint. All the parents were raving about it, and we will definitely use Sheila again.

originalText.text: I first worked with Sheila when she was providing face painting services to our school's street fair. Now that Covid is a part of our life and parties are "virtual" Sheila was able to provide these AWESOME unique stuffed balloons for the end of school in quarantine using the girls' school colors back in June. Then for my older daughter's 13th birthday I hired Sheila to create a sophisticated balloon gift and she even offered suggestions on "what" to stuff some of the balloons with to truly make it a gift. We ended up using gift cards from different stores and it provided enjoyment when my daughter was ready to pop some of the hidden gems to see what was inside. The big clear balloon Sheila uses to stuff and name your child or recipient my kids ended up keeping and playing with long after the other balloons had deflated. I love these so much I am looking for excuses to order more for local friends. SO FUN!
